named-query.name: GET_KITS_BY_USERID
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT k FROM Kit k WHERE k.owner.userId = :userID

named-query.name: GET_ALL_ITEMREFS
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT k FROM Itemref k

named-query.name: SEARCH_ITEMREFS_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT k FROM Itemref k WHERE UPPER(k.name) LIKE :name

named-query.name: GET_ALL_KITTYPES_WITH_SUBKITTYPES
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT k FROM Kittype k
